answers.answer: What do you mean that you have seen it?  You need to call your doc (although it seems that he/she would have been the one to tell you about the protein) and let them know about the urine and swelling.  Have you had your blood pressure checked?  These are all signs of preeclampsia which is very serious for both you and baby...call your doc ASAP!

Yes, this can be a potentially serious problem!  Usually the doctors pick up on that though and that you have early signs and symptoms of preeclampsia.  I had that with my first pregnancy and mine was just mild enough not causing any problems.  I am hoping that is your case as well:)  Take care and good luck to you...

title: urine examination
